title: TCL's 4K smart TVs are on sale at Amazon right now — you can save up to $500 on select models
text:
TCL

TCL's 4-series contains some of the best budget TVs that money can buy. They offer a great viewing experience and a variety of smart features. For a limited time, the 43-inch and 75-inch models are on sale for $100 and $500 off respectively.

The massive 75-inch 75S425 TV is the more expensive model, but it's on sale for $500 off its original price of $1,299. That means you'll be paying $799.99 for the big-screen 4K TV.

If you're looking for a smaller set, you can get the 43-inch 43S425 for $100 off its original price of $329.99. That means you'll pay $229.99.

Both TVs are good purchases, especially at the discounted prices. Reviewers have praised their vivid, accurate colors. You won't get the same viewing experience that higher-end TVs offer, but the 4-series is among the best in its low price range.

The sets are powered by the smart Roku TV platform. You can access basically any streaming service you need, including Netflix, Amazon Prime, Google Play, Sling, and YouTube. The products come with a Roku TV remote with handy dedicated buttons for DirecTV Now, Hulu, Netflix, and Sling TV.

On the back, you'll find a variety of ports, including three HDMI ports, a USB port, a headphone jack, and an Ethernet port. Both sets are compatible with Alexa and Google Assistant.

The 42S425 and 75S425 are great TVs for the money at their original prices. With these discounts, they're an even better option. $500 is a pretty huge discount, and $229.99 is about as cheap as you can get when it comes to TVs. We're not sure how long these deals will last, so take advantage soon if you're interested.
description: TCL is an excellent budget TV brand, and its 43S425 and 75S425 models are great buys. They're on sale for $100 and $500 off respectively.
